headline: I'm Tzivi
experienceText: I'm React and Python Developer with a passion for creating performant user experiences. With experience in backend development, unit and E2E testing, and manual testing, I collaborate with frontend teams to develop features for the project's API. My technical skills include Docker, React, Node, CSS, Bash, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
goals: My dual focus is on improving our collaborative workspace while embracing daily learning opportunities. I believe that continuous growth and creating an efficient environment go hand in hand, allowing our team to deliver exceptional results while expanding our capabilities.
softSkillsFourthTip: Desire to work in high-performance teams
softSkillsFifthTip: Dedication to professional growth and improvement
recommendationsSubTitle: Creators I follow and aspire to become
